t.t: Gear On Rent - IoT-Enabled Construction Equipment | RACH INFRA

meta.name: description
meta.content: Rent modern construction equipment with IoT tracking. Production basis or hourly/daily rates. 50+ machines, pan-India delivery, 98% on-time record.

div.h1:
Gear On Rent
Smart Construction Equipment
div.p:
50+ Modern Machines | Real-Time IoT Tracking | Pan-India Service
Production Basis or Hourly/Daily Rates - You Choose!
Trusted by:
Excavators
Concrete Mixers
Cranes & Hoists
IoT Tracked
We offer two flexible rental models designed to match your project requirements and budget
Perfect for large-scale projects with defined output targets. Pay based on production volume achieved.
Maximum flexibility for short-term needs or variable workloads. Pay only for actual usage time.
Every machine in our fleet is equipped with cutting-edge IoT sensors for maximum efficiency and transparency
Track your rented equipment's location 24/7 through our mobile app or web dashboard. Geo-fencing alerts included.
AI algorithms predict equipment failure 48 hours in advance. Automatic replacement within 4 hours of alert.
Monitor fuel consumption, working hours, idle time, and productivity metrics in real-time through your dashboard.
Get SMS/WhatsApp alerts for maintenance schedules, usage milestones, and critical equipment issues.
Temperature, vibration, pressure, and load sensors ensure optimal performance and prevent equipment damage.
Automatic shutdown on overload detection, tilt sensors for crane safety, and operator behavior monitoring.
Get instant cost estimates for your equipment rental needs

t.t-value: gear_on_rent_category and request.env['product.template'].sudo().search([('website_published', '=', True), ('sale_ok', '=', True), ('public_categ_ids', 'child_of', gear_on_rent_category.ids)], order='name') or request.env['product.template'].sudo().browse([])
(product._fields.get('x_hourly_rate') and product.x_hourly_rate) or (product._fields.get('x_hourly_price') and product.x_hourly_price) or product.list_price
(product._fields.get('x_daily_rate') and product.x_daily_rate) or (product._fields.get('x_daily_price') and product.x_daily_price) or hourly_price
(product._fields.get('x_production_rate') and product.x_production_rate) or (product._fields.get('x_production_price') and product.x_production_price) or product.list_price

t.option: Configure Gear On Rent products to unlock calculator

div.p: Fill in the details and click "Calculate Cost" to see your estimate

Note: These are estimated costs. Final pricing may vary based on equipment availability, location, and additional services. GST will be added as per applicable rates. For accurate quotes, please contact our team or call +91 92893 75999.
State-of-the-art machinery for every construction need
Need equipment not listed here? We can source it for you!
Industry-leading service with proven track record
Service across 15+ states with owned plants and 12 certified vendor partners. Same-day delivery in Delhi NCR, <72 hour dispatch nationwide.
Industry-best delivery record with GPS tracking for full transparency. Our 2023 performance: 98.4% on-time deliveries across 1,000+ projects.
All equipment comes with real-time tracking, usage analytics, and predictive maintenance alerts. You stay in control, always.
Full maintenance coverage during rental period. Equipment breakdown? We replace it within 4 hours or your rental is free for that day.
Quality assurance with NABL accredited testing and blockchain-based material traceability. Trusted by L&T, Shapoorji Pallonji, Tata Projects.
No hidden charges. Quotes include GST, delivery, and 30-day support. Price match guarantee - we'll beat competitors by 2%.
Real feedback from real clients who chose RACH INFRA
Project Head, DMRC (Delhi Metro)

"Their IoT equipment saved us from a ₹5L loss. We rented a concrete mixer for a 15-day highway project. The IoT system alerted us about overheating 2 days before a breakdown. Their team replaced it within 4 hours. Reliability we've never seen elsewhere!"
Architect, GreenSpace Builders, Gurgaon

"We hesitated to rent heavy equipment initially, but their team trained our operators onsite. The excavators were well-maintained, and the real-time tracking gave us complete peace of mind. 20% faster project completion with zero equipment downtime."
Contractor, Noida

"The production-basis rental model saved us ₹3.2L on our apartment project. Their calculator gave us precise requirements, and flexible payment terms helped our cash flow. Professional service from quote to delivery!"
NCR Buildtech, Skyline Infra

"Thanks to RACH INFRA's fast deployment model, we saved 20% in manpower costs on our Gurgaon high-rise project. Same-day delivery in NCR is a game-changer. The IoT dashboard helps us optimize equipment usage across multiple sites."
Infrastructure Project, Faridabad

"Finally, a supplier that answers calls after 7 PM! Their 24/7 escalation desk saved us during an emergency crane requirement. Equipment arrived within 6 hours on a Sunday. That's commitment to client service!"
Residential Projects, Lucknow
"Their equipment is well-maintained and operators were trained directly by RACH INFRA. The hourly rental model gave us flexibility for short-term needs. Seamless experience from booking to return!"
